alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Izard; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 7:57PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Stone, southwestern Izard and southern Baxter Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 757 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lone Star, or near Melbourne, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Gid... Herpel... Lunenburg... Brandenberg... Lone Star... Blanchard Springs Campground... Guion... Allison... Mt Olive in Izard County... Fifty-Six... Boswell... Optimus... Twin Creek... Sylamore Bike Trail... Gunner Pool Campground... Sylamore... Barkshed Campground... Sylamore Shooting Range... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
